--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/TVML/contentsmode crawled: 2025-12-03T18:00:20Z --- # contentsMode **Article** Specifies how an image is expanded to fill its containing element. ## Overview Use the `contentsMode` attribute to specify how the image is scaled within its bounding box. Here’s an example that demonstrates the `contentsMode` attribute in a `stackTemplate`: ```xml contentsMode
aspectFit aspectFitBB aspectFill
``` ### Values ### Elements That Use contentsMode - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/img] ## Image Display - **aspectFill**: Stretches an image to fill the containing bounding box. - **opaque**: Indicates whether an image has a transparent background. - **mode**: Specifies how an image is displayed. - **type**: Specifies how a badge is drawn. - **value**: Specifies the value used for a fillable element.
